mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DISH (NAME, CATEGORY_ID, PRICE, IMAGE, DESCRIPTION, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, CREATE_USER, UPDATE_USER, STATUS) VALUES (#{name}, #{categoryId}, #{price}, #{image}, #{description}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{createUser}, #{updateUser}, #{status})
mapper.update:
UPDATE DISH
name = #{name},
category_id = #{categoryId},
price = #{price},
image = #{image},
description = #{description},
status = #{status},
update_time = #{updateTime},
update_user = #{updateUser},
id = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT D.*, C.`NAME` AS CATEGORY_NAME FROM DISH D LEFT JOIN CATEGORY C ON D.`CATEGORY_ID` = C.`ID`
AND D.NAME LIKE concat('%',#{name},'%')
AND C.status = #{status}
ORDER BY D.create_time DESC
